Code:
import robot

dtable = [0, -1, 0, -0.5, 1, 0, 0.5, 0]
k = 30000
b = 30000
def RobotControl():
	a = robot.readsensors(3)
	i = 0
	if(a[0] > 16500):
		i = i + 1
	if(a[1] > 16500):
		i = i + 2
	if(a[2] > 16500):
		i = i + 4
	e = dtable[i]	
	
	robot.motors(k + e*b, k - e*b)

robot.timer(freq = 50, callback = RobotControl)
